An enum to be used as a response to a join request.

close() - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.ConnectionListener
Close the listening socket, and the thread that is running.

close() - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.PostOffice
Close the thread for the post office object.
close() - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.Receiver
Close the thread, this will stop the receiver thread loop.
closeConversation(String) - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.ConversationHolder

com.networks.p2pchat - package com.networks.p2pchat
 
ConnectionListener - Class in com.networks.p2pchat
Connection listener class, will listen on a particular port for incoming connections, when one is received it will pass the newly opened socket to the post office class to be handled there.
ConnectionListener(PostOffice, int) - Constructor for class com.networks.p2pchat.ConnectionListener
Constructor - takes in the holding class and the listening port.
Conversation - Class in com.networks.p2pchat
Embodies a conversation Holds sender and receiver objects Senders are not threaded, receivers are Takes a ConversationHolder object in the constructor (this also holds the conversation object) Takes a Socket object, from which input and output streams are created.
Conversation(ConversationHolder, Socket) - Constructor for class com.networks.p2pchat.Conversation
Standard constructor.
ConversationHolder - Class in com.networks.p2pchat
Conversation holding class, handles logic of which conversation a particular message should be sent to.
ConversationHolder(PostOffice, int) - Constructor for class com.networks.p2pchat.ConversationHolder
Takes in a post office object for passing messages, and the port that listen servers are running on.
